JobFullDesc: Product Marketing ManagerAs a global business with groundbreaking products, solutions and services there’s always scope for Dell Technologies to grow sales and expand market share. So, a world-class, highly skilled Marketing team is essential. We develop and implement strategic approaches to solutions and technology marketing that put our products, solutions and services at the forefront of our customers’ minds. Always ready to adjust strategies in response to market change and competition, our team works closely with sales, product partners and vendors and are always customer-focused.Join us as a Product Marketing Manager on our Marketing team in the US to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.What you’ll achieveAs a Solutions Marketing Consultant, you will own and project manage all core marketing aspects of your solutions, developing and owning the core messaging and working closely with other members of marketing, sales and product management as the champion and subject matter expert for your solutions.You will:Serve as the Marketing subject matter expert for your solutionsOwn the creation of innovative and impactful messaging and marketing contentDevelop and execute integrated marketing plans for your solutions in collaboration with other individuals and teams across product management, sales, services and other marketing groups.Take the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table.
